Articles.Content:
The Doppeldecker MKII is a SSTO that is capable of delivering a small payload to an Orbit around Kerbin, Mun and to the surface of Minmus. The Cargo Bay can be replaced with a MK2 Crew Cabin for additional Crew capacity.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/xQh-GiSas1s?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Mods used:**

- Trajectories
- Better Time Warp
- Camera Tools
- Astronomer's Visual Pack V3 BETA
- Collision FX
- Planetshine

**Music used:**

 Here At Last

 by Andrew Seistrup

 [http://www.andrewseistrup.com/](http://www.andrewseistrup.com/)

**Download:**

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/9kulhomm6xmcdmp/The%20Doppeldecker%20MKII.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/9kulhomm6xmcdmp/The%20Doppeldecker%20MKII.craft?dl=0)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-12T19:03:49Z" title="08/12/2015 07:03  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 12, 2015</time> by Derpiderp**
